translations.name: Good News in Romany
translations.description: In 1973 British and Foreign Bible Society (BFBS) published Luke 15 as \\\"Shavved then got latchered (Lost and Found)\\\" as a diglot of Romany and English using the Good News Bible. In 1979 BFBS published portions of Mark 1:4-45 (Jesus Heals a Leper), Mark 12:41-44 (the Rich and Poor), Luke 8:22-25 (Jesus Calms a Storm) were published in Romany as \\\"A Kushti Lav (Good News For You)\\\". In 1981 BFBS published portions of Luke 4:16-19 (Jesus is Rejected at Nazareth), Luke 16:19-31 (the Rich Man and Lazarus), Luke 17: 11-19 (Jesus Heals Ten Men) and Luke 23:32-43 (Jesus is Crucified) in Romany as \\\"More Kushti Lavs\\\". These portions, collectively called Kushti Lavs, were digitised by BFBS in 2013.

translations.name: Kushti Lavs

In 1981 BFBS published portions of Luke 4:16-19 (Jesus is Rejected at Nazareth), Luke 16:19-31 (the Rich Man and Lazarus), Luke 17: 11-19 (Jesus Heals Ten Men) and Luke 23:32-43 (Jesus is Crucified) in Romany as \\\"More Kushti Lavs\\\".
